rooms.description: Large entrance hall with space for welcome decor and seating area. The design uses natural materials aligning with Vastu principles.
Open-plan living space combining dining and sitting area. Designed for family interactions and social gatherings with ample natural light from south-facing windows.
Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area. Equipped with modern amenities and ventilation designed for energy efficiency while respecting Vastu principles (positioned in east or north zone).
Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. Placed in the north-west corner to ensure calm energy flow per Vastu.
Cozy guest room with attached bathroom. Designed to be flexible for family use while following Vastu alignments.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy with a private balcony. Ensuring balanced energy distribution and proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Compact living space for domestic staff with kitchenette and attached bathroom. Positioned on the east side to ensure harmony.
Dedicated storage and utility room for household appliances, placed near the kitchen area in compliance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Sturdy entrance door leading to the main hall. Vastu recommends a secure and inviting entry point.
Strategically placed windows to allow ample natural light and maintain proper ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
A staircase leading to the rooftop terrace, ensuring safe and accessible access while maintaining structural integrity.

rooms.description: A versatile bedroom designed for privacy with adjoining balcony and storage area. Placed in a Vastu-compliant orientation.
Primary bathroom for first floor residents, designed with efficient water drainage and natural light in line with Vastu recommendations.

openings.description: Internal staircase connecting ground and first floor with secure railings. Designed to ensure a steady flow of energy.

rooms.description: Additional compact space for servant use on the upper level, ensuring separation from family areas while maintaining Vastu balance.
Loft area designed for storage or a home office. Placed in the west zone to balance energy distribution.

openings.description: Internal staircase providing access between first and second floors. Built in accordance with structural safety and Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Open terrace space with seating and greenery, designed for relaxation and open-air entertainment. Provides a panoramic view while aligning with Vastu's emphasis on the upper zone.
